short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Witness Esdeath's chilling gaze with her signature hat and piercing blue eyes, as white particles swirl around her.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the icy power of Esdeath with a chilling and captivating theme!

🎨 Minimalist Design: Featuring Esdeath’s piercing blue eyes and iconic hat, set against a background where white particles drift through the air, reflecting her cold, calculating nature.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a display that enhances Esdeath’s imposing presence, reflecting her cool and composed demeanor.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly access your favorite websites, with the same sharp precision Esdeath brings to the battlefield.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into exciting mini-games inspired by Esdeath’s world of power and strategy.
🔍 Search Bar: Conduct fast and efficient searches, perfectly matching the cold elegance of the theme.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as powerful and graceful as Esdeath herself.
